AgentListItem.description: Agent list item for list response

EncryptCredentialConfigurationParamsInne.description:
Parameters for encrypting credential configuration.
Uses dek_alias to look up the DEK to use for encryption.

dek_alias.description: The DEK alias to use for encryption (resolved to actual DEK id internally)

value.description: The raw credential configuration value to encrypt

envelope_keys.description:
Map of envelope key id (ARN or file_name) -> envelope key configuration with nested DEKs
DEKs are stored by their alias name (e.g., "default") rather than UUID

EnvelopeKeyConfigAwsKms.description: Envelope encryption key configuration with nested DEKs

SecretConfig.description: Configuration for a secret stored in soma.yaml

dek_alias.description: The DEK alias used to encrypt this secret

value.description: The encrypted value of the secret
